name: BuddhaSoft
description:
BuddhaSoft is a software development company founded in January 2015 and located in Eastern Europe (Ukraine) with head office in Kiev. 

Our high skilled developers have experience in building amazing soft which help our clients to solve business tasks and become number one in theirs marketplace.

We have different departments in our company: back-end (Python), front-end (JavaScript) and QA. All of them work in a strong cooperation for to do our best and give our clients high quality products within a limited period of time.

We believe that tech development can improve people’s lives in many ways. We have expertise in such spheres as financial, social, healthcare, etc.
